page.title: 03THE VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: Mace is a food store in Dartington. It gets lots of customers.It is pretty big and it sells a big variety of food such as flour, cereal,dairy products, snacks and drinks.It has a post office It advertises things in the window and has good displays. There is a house on top.It is opposite the school so it gets lots of people from the school. It opens at 8.30 and closes at 5.30. It is owned by Mr. Guy,that is why it is some times called Guy's.Some times there are long queues.I think Guy's shop is important because there are no other good food stores in Dartington. If Guy's shop closed down people would have to go to town and thats a bit of a hassle.The people at Guy's are friendly (in my opinion.) I think it's handy because it's just over the road from our school so the teachers can nip over for snacks.
